attributes.title: App is not worth anything
attributes.review: I got the app to stay up to date with the election and it crashed my phone. I had to uninstall it and it kept crashing my phone every time. I ended up deciding it’s not worth it because I’m too young to vote and I wouldn’t vote for trump anyways

attributes.title: WTH IS THIS?!
attributes.review: When it says in the name and description you can “text trump”, I knew it wouldn’t be real, but the FAKEST ANSWERS. Trump created this app to get more people on him sode, but if he were a good president, then maybe he wouldn’t need it. I just wanted to test it out but this app is TRASH. Oh and by the way, “‘ under 14 years old. Yeah it’s THAT BAD.

attributes.title: terrible!
attributes.review: App took a month and a half to open, when i finally got it fixed i opened the app and trumps orange fat face apearrred on my screen saying, you’re ugly! Then he started saying the n word! i have never been more offended in my life!!!! delete this app immediately

attributes.title: Worst app ever 😤😡
attributes.review: So I downloaded the app and it took forever to download in the first place. When I opened it up I saw something so horrible and disgusting that I’m shocked this app is even allowed to be a app. I’m not sorry for the bad review at all this app need to be removed ASAP if you ask me.

attributes.title: Spam
attributes.review: This app it really annoying and i just don’t think it a good app. I downloaded it to see what the presidents plans were but i don’t need a notification from it very second. i just don’t think it is a good app. If you are looking to get it just don’t.

attributes.title: ✨Horrible app✨
attributes.review: This app is horrible I think it’s because mr Orange is the one not the front of the app. But this app is disturbing I have zero satisfaction, not only that there was glitches everywhere and I it took wayyy too long to download it. This app can cause you’re phone to stay orange so do NOT get it. Sincerely: Gen Z

attributes.title: The worst app i have ever download
attributes.review: The app is so bad. Its glitchs whenever i try to use it. Werid ads keeps popping up. Its as if 9 year old's made the app. My phone shuts down whenever i try and open the app. This app is not only usless its causes problems too. Please take it down.😡

attributes.title: THIS APP MURDERED MY SON 🤢🙈
attributes.review: very very bad no good scary cheeto man killed my son. when i opened this app after it took 72 years to download, the very scary antifa terrorists immediately hacked into my phone and stole all my personal information!! they then blackmailed me, found my address, and broke into my house and MURDERED MY SON. do not download this app, it is VERY VERY BAD!! :((

attributes.title: Wish I could give it a zero

I was never rooting for him but how dare he 👹👹👹 black lives matter babes and wear a mask it’s good for ya
